capability.name: Branch Currency Distribution
capability.definition: Schedule and coordinate the secure distribution of cash inventory across the branch and ATM networks
capability.role: This service domain handles the scheduling and secure distribution of currency throughout the branch network (for bank branches and remote ATM locations). It ensures the required float is maintained at locations and undertakes the movement into and out of central currency holding facilities as necessary to ensure cash availability
capability.example: ATMs at a branch location are stocked with currency in response to anticipated customer demand

key_features.name: Distribution vehicle fleet administration
key_features.description: Enables distribution vehicle fleet administration to support schedule and coordinate the secure distribution of cash inventory across the branch and atm networks

key_features.name: Distribution planning and scheduling
key_features.description: Enables distribution planning and scheduling to support schedule and coordinate the secure distribution of cash inventory across the branch and atm networks

key_features.name: Distribution activity monitoring and control
key_features.description: Enables distribution activity monitoring and control to support schedule and coordinate the secure distribution of cash inventory across the branch and atm networks

key_features.name: Central cash access coordination
key_features.description: Enables central cash access coordination to support schedule and coordinate the secure distribution of cash inventory across the branch and atm networks
